text: "Take It Off" is a song by American singer Kesha. It is the fourth single from her debut album, Animal. It was released by RCA Records on July 13, 2010. The song has reached the top ten in the US and Canada and the top 15 in the UK. The song was certified platinum in the US for shipments of one million copies there. == References == Category:Kesha songs Category:2010 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:Pop songs Category:Songs about sexuality
title: Take It Off
